page.title: 20St.Margaret's Church (cont)
page.content:
and the May Queen is crowned by the local Member of Parliament. The May Queen and her attendants all get presents and after the May Queen Service they all go into St.Luke's Room for tea.
{Jackie Hillier aged 10 { Sarah Marshall aged 10 { Rebecca Webzell aged11 { {This disk was compiled by the children {of Bean First School and Darenth {County Primary School. They were {assisted by their parents and by the {following members of staff; Dr.David {Bale, B.Sc., Ph.D., Mr.T.Brightwell, {Mrs.C.Edwards, Mrs.D.Hopkins and {Mr.L.E.Lomas, B.A., D.M.S.. }
